text: ANNUAL FINANCIAL REPORT FISCAL YEAR 2022 ACME CORPORATION EXECUTIVE SUMMARY ACME Corporation is pleased to present its Annual Financial Report for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2022. Despite global economic challenges, our company delivered solid financial results, demonstrating the strength of our business model and the success of our strategic initiatives. Total revenue for fiscal year 2022 was $1,162 million, representing a 5.6% increase compared to $1,100 million in fiscal year 2021. This growth was primarily driven by our core product lines and expansion in key markets. Net income was $167.4 million, up 4.6% from $160 million in the

This growth was primarily driven by our core product lines and expansion in key markets. Net income was $167.4 million, up 4.6% from $160 million in the previous year. This improvement reflects our continued focus on operational efficiency, resulting in a profit margin of 14.4% compared to 14.5% in fiscal year 2021. Debt-to-Equity Ratio: 0.70 - Debt-to-Assets Ratio: 0.41 - Interest Coverage Ratio: 9.5 CONCLUSION AND OUTLOOK ACME Corporation delivered solid financial performance in fiscal year 2022, with growth in revenue, improved profitability, and strong cash flow generation. Looking ahead to fiscal year 2023, we expect continued growth driven by our innovation pipeline and expansion into new markets. We anticipate revenue growth of 6-8% and a further improvement in profit margins. The company remains committed to creating long-term shareholder value through strategic investments, operational excellence, and disciplined capital allocation.
